Description:
Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell

Author: Jonathan Cheong, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation CLIP+ Launcher
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%cmd%' and command like '%&&%' and command like '%clipboard]::%' and command like '%-f%') and (command like '%/c%' or command like '%/r%')
